channel.title: Justin Dong, Beatrice Riviere on Justin Dong
channel.description: Recent content in Justin Dong, Beatrice Riviere on Justin Dong

item.title: A semi-implicit method for incompressible three-phase flow in porous media
item.description: In this paper, we present a semi-implicit method for the incompressible three-phase flow equations in two dimensions. In particular, a high-order discontinuous Galerkin spatial discretization is coupled with a backward Euler discretization in time.
